title: Can't play league!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: As you see in the photo, I'm disconnected and can't play. It never reconnects. What should I do? {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It definitely looks like your client is having a hard time reaching our servers properly. There could be a few different reasons for this, but I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are good.

Hit me up if you still encounter issues after taking those steps.

Use legacy client lol 
it's an option before you launch the launcher

Repair the full client is all I can say lol
I had this problem too but I simply had to just use the legacy client instead of the new one.
